<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157678</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching the Holocaust through stamps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichten des Holocaust durch Stempel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enseignement emboutit Holocauste à travers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensinando o Holocaust através dos selos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzione del Holocaust attraverso i bolli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία του ολοκαυτώματος μέσω των γραμματοσήμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza del Holocaust a través de sellos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An Interdisciplinary and Computerized Program through the use of Stamps, Pictures, Texts and Paintings by Children in the Holocaust. Includes a teachers guide.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stamps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interdisziplinäres und automatisiertes 
Programm durch den Gebrauch von Stempeln, Abbildungen, Texten und 
Anstrichen durch Children im Holocaust. Schließt eine 
Lehreranleitung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un programme interdisciplinaire et automatisé par
l'utilisation des timbres, des images, des textes et des peintures par
Children dans Holocauste. Inclut un guide de professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um programa interdisciplinary e computarizado com 
o uso dos selos, dos retratos, dos textos e das pinturas por Criança 
no Holocaust. Inclui uma guia dos professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma interdisciplinare ed automatizzato 
con l'uso dei bolli, delle immagini, dei testi e delle pitture da 
Children nel Holocaust. Include una guida degli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διεπιστημονικό και αυτοματοποιημένο πρόγραμμα 
μέσω της χρήσης των γραμματοσήμων, των εικόνων, των κειμένων και 
των έργων ζωγραφικής από τα παιδιά στο ολοκαύτωμα. 
Περιλαμβάνει έναν οδηγό δασκάλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un programa interdisciplinario y automatizado con 
el uso de sellos, de cuadros, de textos y de pinturas de Children en 
el Holocaust. Incluye una guía de los profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stempel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">timbres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">selos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bolli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματόσημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ολοκαύτωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
